name: Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition full game

long_desc:
※This product contains contents for PlayStation®Vita and PlayStation®3. For more information about PlayStation®3, please check at the PlayStation®Store.

Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition is the definitive compilation of the landmark first-person shooter that includes enhanced versions of Duke Nukem 3D and three classic expansion packs as well as the original version of the classic game.

This content is only compatible with PlayStation®Vita.

Copyright：

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement.
